3.name: Code page 500 (EBCDIC Multinational No. 5)
3.desc: Encoding schema for the repertoire as defined by the code page.

4.desc: Encoding schema for the repertoire as defined by the code page.

5.desc: Universal Multiple-Octet Coded Character Set (UCS) two-octet per character encoding schema as defined in ISO/IEC 10646-1.

6.desc: Universal Multiple-Octet Coded Character Set (UCS) four-octet per character encoding schema as defined in ISO/IEC 10646-1.

7.desc: UCS Transformation Format 8 (UTF-8) multi-octet (of length one to six octets) per character encoding schema as defined in ISO/IEC 10646-1, Annex R.

8.desc: UCS Transformation Format 16 (UTF-16) two-octet per character encoding schema as defined in ISO/IEC 10646-1, Annex Q.
